metadata.title: CVE-2018-16586 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 4.0.x before 4.0.32, 5.0.x before5.0.30, and 6.0.x before 6.0.11, an attacker could send a malicious emailto an OTRS system. If a logged in user opens it, the email could cause thebrowser to load external image or CSS resources.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
